flawed_nl_solution:
This many baby turtles are in the ocean: 42 / 3 = <<42/3=41>>41 turtles.
This many baby turtles are still on the sand: 42 - 41 = <<42-41=1>>1 turtles.
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
